name: Aave / C.R.E.A.M. Lender Optimizer
description: Lends {{token}} on [AAVE](https://app.aave.com/home) and [C.R.E.A.M.](https://app.cream.finance/) to gain interest and accumulate staked AAVE as rewards. When the staked AAVE unlocks the AAVE will be harvested, sold for more {{token}}, and re-deposited into the vault.
